```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(reshape2)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)

pdf(NULL)

starwars <- starwars
starwars$films <- NULL
starwars$vehicles <- NULL
starwars$starships <- NULL
meltwars <- melt(starwars, id = "name")
meltwars$name <- as.factor(meltwars$name)
```

### Mass

```{r}
renderPlotly({
    dat <- subset(meltwars, name %in% c("Luke Skywalker", "Darth Vader", "Jabba Desilijic Tiure", "Obi-Wan Kenobi", "R2-D2", "Dexter Jettster") & variable == "mass")
    ggplot(data = dat, aes(x = name, y = as.numeric(value), fill = name)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
  })
```

### Height

```{r}
renderPlotly({
    dat <- subset(meltwars, name %in% c("Luke Skywalker", "Darth Vader", "Jabba Desilijic Tiure", "Obi-Wan Kenobi", "R2-D2", "Chewbacca") & variable == "height")
    ggplot(data = dat, aes(x = name, y = as.numeric(value), fill = name)) + geom_bar(stat = "identity")
  })
```

### Table 

```{r}
DT::renderDataTable({
    subset(starwars, name %in% c("Luke Skywalker", "Darth Vader", "Jabba Desilijic Tiure", "Obi-Wan Kenobi", "R2-D2", "Dexter Jettster", "Han Solo"), select = c(name, height, mass, birth_year, homeworld, species))
})
```
